articles.title: JSE tumbles as emerging markets buckle under China worries - News24
articles.description: Emerging market stocks slipped on Thursday, with Asian bourses under heavy selling pressure as optimism about China's reopening from Covid-19 restrictions gave way to fears about the spread of the virus globally.
